TextLibrary.Text: Ahhh... My treasure is back. I will never leave it again, never, ever, ever...

Ahhh... My treasure is back. I will never leave it again, never, ever, ever...
Ahhh... My treasure is back. I will never leave it again, never, ever, ever...
I can understand why, Patch. It's beautiful.
I can understand why, Patch. It's beautiful.
I can understand why, Patch. It's beautiful.
I can understand why, Patch. It's beautiful.
You are my good friend! Have some treasure! It is payment for helping me get it all back.
